name: An adamantine pickaxe (2h)
data: It has awesome weapon class for its type (tremendous in general).
It increases the users strength adequately.
It increases the users constitution adequately.
This item loses its magical powers incredibly slowly.
It gives great bonus to the skill 'ferocious swing'.
It gives great bonus to the skill 'spot weakness'.
It gives great bonus to the skill 'brawl'.
It gives great bonus to the skill 'dirty blow'.
The pickaxe is a favored weapon of elite brawlers.
